sentences.en: As with all dietary changes, reducing salt should be done gradually.
sentences.cn: 像所有改变饮食结构的情况一样，减少盐的摄入量也应当采取渐进的方式。

sentences.en: Dietary experts can advise on the ins and outs of dieting.
sentences.cn: 饮食专家可以对日常饮食的方方面面提出建议。

sentences.en: Dietary fibre was touted as the latest cure - all , cutting down weight and promoting good health.
sentences.cn: 食物纤维素被吹捧成最新的万灵仙丹, 既可减轻体重,又有益健康.

sentences.en: Fats and sugar are very rich in energy but poor in vitamins, minerals and dietary fibre.
sentences.cn: 脂肪和糖类热量很高，但维生素、矿物质和膳食纤维贫乏。

sentences.en: It was Moore's peculiar dietary habits that helped land him the title role in Arthur.
sentences.cn: 穆尔的特别的饮食方法竟使他得以在《亚瑟》中饰演主角.

sentences.en: Pesticide residue acute dietary risk assessment has attracted attention only recently.
sentences.cn: 农药残留急性膳食风险评估直到最近才引起大家的关注.

sentences.en: Some resistant starch is measured when total dietary fibre is measured.
sentences.cn: 当总计的饮食纤维被测量的时候,一些反抗的淀粉被测量.

sentences.en: The average daily dietary intake of calories is 2952 Kcal per person.
sentences.cn: 罪犯每人每天从食品中摄取的热量为2952千卡.

sentences.en: The bacteria in the stagnant bowel consume dietary vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 肠道内的细菌消耗食物中的维生素B12.

sentences.en: The dietary influence, powerful in so many respects, counted also in political life.
sentences.cn: 饮食的影响在许多方面有力量, 在政治生活上也非常重要.

sentences.en: The liver not only is the receptor of dietary fat.
sentences.cn: 肝脏是日粮脂肪的接受者.

sentences.en: The main components of Jerusalem artichoke powder, more dietary fiber and sugar.
sentences.cn: 其主要成分为菊芋粉 、 膳食纤维和多糖类.

sentences.en: What is the dietary rudder of the patient after esophagus cancer art?
sentences.cn: 食管癌术后病人的饮食指导原则是什么?

sentences.en: What reason causes conjunctivitis? What problem should dietary respect note?
sentences.cn: 结膜炎是什么原因引起的? 饮食方面应该注意哪些问题?

words.tran_cn: 给…规定饮食；喂食（diet的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 食品强化剂；食物的补充

trans.tran_en: related to the food someone eats
